title: Edutainment-Based ESP (English for Specific Purposes) Curriculum for Engineering and Technology Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Core professional knowledge in engineering and technology fields, beginner-level English communication skills
context.additional_context: A course for working professionals to simultaneously enhance English communication skills and innovative problem-solving competencies required in workplaces, conducted in smartphone-centric limited technological environments

learning_goals: Students can accurately understand and use over 80% of specialized English terminology and expressions related to engineering and technical field practices
Through edutainment-based problem-solving activities, students can analyze real-world work scenarios in English and propose solutions
Students can perform effective communication in English and submit project deliverables using team-based online collaboration tools

resources: English Database for Engineering and Technology Fields
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
